trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown if an error occurs during the generation of Web Services Description Language (WSDL).
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 產生期間發生錯誤時擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SUDSGeneratorException> is generated by the remoting WSDL generator.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SUDSGeneratorException>遠端服務的 WSDL 產生器所產生。

trans-unit.source: The WSDL generator is used by the [Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40f6f8c8-b80c-4e9f-a920-31bcd0cf45c5), and can also be invoked programmatically using the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.MetaData> class.
trans-unit.target: WSDL 產生器由[Soapsuds 工具 (Soapsuds.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40f6f8c8-b80c-4e9f-a920-31bcd0cf45c5)，而且也會叫用程式設計方式使用<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.MetaData>類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SUDSGeneratorException> uses the HRESULT COR_E_EXCEPTION, which has the value 0x80131500.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SUDSGeneratorException> 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_EXCEPTION，其具有值 0x80131500。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SUDSGeneratorException>, see the <xref:System.Exception> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SUDSGeneratorException>，請參閱<xref:System.Exception>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />，包含所擲回之例外狀況的相關序列化物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 包含有關來源或目的端內容資訊的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SUDSGeneratorException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.SUDSGeneratorException" /> 類別的新執行個體。
